section.title: dali/remote
section.para: The dali/remote directory contains the sources for the dali/remote library.

The makefile is for SunOS compiler which is available for download from Oracle Solaris Studio (not in Solaris OS image). Two compiled binaries: 1) daliservix: compiled on Solaris 10 Sparc with SunOS compiler. 2) daliservix_s86: compiled on Solaris 10 x86 with SunOS compiler. The makefle can be run with either SunOS make or GNU gmake.
